Published October 29 2014

Chicago's four-block stretch of streets where drivers, cyclists, and pedestrians are all equal

Chicago's four-block stretch of streets where drivers, cyclists, and pedestrians are all equal — My mother used to have a saying, “it doesn’t matter if you have the right away, you still don’t want to get hit.” This is going to be one hell of an experiment.

Enjoy your day.
